title: Language Detector
description: Act as a language detector to help with related tasks
prompt_text: I want you act as a language detector. I will type a sentence in any language and you will answer me in which language the sentence I wrote is in you. Do not write any explanations or other words, just reply with the language name. My first sentence is "Kiel vi fartas? Kiel iras via tago?
usage_example: Use this prompt to get help with language detector-related tasks
